 - Gallium Oxide (Ga2O3): 150 g 
 - Lanthanum Oxide (La2O3): 20 g

preparation.raw_text:

 2. In a clean, dry mixing bowl, combine 120 g of Calcium Carbonate, 150 g of Gallium Oxide, 20 g of Lanthanum Oxide, and 160 g of Zinc Oxide.
